The Exiled kalphite guardian is found within the Exiled Kalphite Hive. It is found in the passageways of the hive, near the tunnel that leads to the Kalphite King and also protects the King from their enemies.

Exiled kalphite guardians have quickly become a popular monster for those with Kalphite slayer tasks and players looking to train Summoning, due to the higher Slayer XP per kill than their standard Kalphite equivalent and the very high drop rate of both crimson and blue charms.

It fights exclusively with melee attacks, which, like many of the other kalphites in the hive, may inflict poison. This poison is generally ignored due to its low damage.

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Requirements Spawns Map
Exiled Kalphite Hive98None12Maplink

Can be safe spotted. Enter the hive and walk straight until you get to the U turn. Stand at the inner section of the wall on the north side. Kill the Kalphites chasing you and the ones that spawn in will be stuck at the sides of the U.

High level players may opt to attune a boss portal to the Exiled Kalphite Queen. This would take them straight to a chamber full of exiled kalphite marauders and guardians.

Rare drop table drops[edit | edit source]

This monster has access to the rare drop table.
Luck-enhancing items are not required to access the table, but they will increase the chance of accessing the rare drop table and may also improve the loot received from it.
